item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Jesstern. My pronouns are they/them. I live in Singapore where I work as a software engineer. Work In the early days, I worked on frameworks like Joomla, WordPress, CakePHP, and Ruby on Rails. These days I mostly work on JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js with a keen interest in serverless technologies. üßë‚Äçüíª As a consultant with ThoughtWorks, I’ve developed bespoke digital solutions with a real estate company, and two financial institutions.

item.title: BBC Earth Daily
item.description: How I built the BBC Earth Daily chatbot

item.title: Daily Dad Jokes
item.description: How I built an event-driven serverless Telegram bot to deliver dad jokes to you daily

item.title: Now
item.description: This is a now page. Here’s what I’m focused on at the moment. Building a chatbot for artists to sell their music I am working on a project to allow artists to sell their music directly on a chatbot. Last updated on 7 Sep 2021 in Singapore.
